div.p: C.E.B. and R.M.B. co-wrote the scripts for the two neural network models. C.E.B. carried out all data pre-processing, numerical simulations, data analysis and wrote the manuscript. R.M.B. developed the autoregressive model and helped to design the study. D.S.G.T. helped to design the study and assisted in the field. All authors discussed the results and commented on drafts of the manuscript.
